page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: { Dickinsons Garage -WINSFORD. Although the business was founded in 1919 by the great grandfather of the present owner, it has been housed in the present building since 1962. The garage offers a wide range of services including car repairs,new and used car sales, vehicle hire, parts and accessory sales and petrol sales. Customers are attracted from a wide area of Mid-Cheshire for vehicle sales and hire, although the sale of fuel largely depends on regular local customers. The average amount of fuel sold is 8000 litres a week. The garage is run as a family concern and employs 26 people, most of whom work in the car repair section. Car sales accounts for approximately 50% of the business and the average turnover is around 30 vehicles per month. Half of these are mostly new.
